name: Emitters
description: Emitters is a single, or co-op fps survival drones invasions game.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 8 (64bits) Processor: Intel Core i3 2.3 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 760 3gb Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: windows 10 (64bits) Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 3.40GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 6gb Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
